text: We had a fantastic experience at Framelines Gallery! A big thank you to Ron for his warm and knowledgeable service—his advice on frame style and colour selection was spot on. Our artwork looks incredible, and we’ll definitely be back to frame more pieces in the future!

We have been going to Framelines Gallery for more than 10 years. We are always impressed by the final result of their framing. We are very satisfied with the initial discussion with Ron personally, updates on the progress and the final delivery timelines. Our art pieces always look elevated and timeless after the framings. We often get many compliments from our friends and guests at our house. We truly recommend them for your well loved art pieces.

Thank you Ron for the awesome experience in framing our artwork and photos! From intending to frame 2 artwork in our first visit to returning multiple times to frame more artwork and photos! It was truly enjoyable going through the artwork and hearing Ron's proposals of how different frames would bring out different effects of the artwork. Thank you very much! We will definitely be back again!

I cannot recommend Framelines enough! They are wonderful people and even better framers. I got a number of pieces framed here and they did a phenomenal job. They were super helpful in suggesting customizations and the turnaround was quite fast with interim updates.

Chance upon Framelines Gallery website while google search to frame my painting. Was glad that I chose Framelines. Ron is very patient and professional in providing many suggestions which helped me in my final choice of frames. I have ended up getting him to frame two items. While the cost is not cheap, but it’s the overall service and end products that satisfied your soul :)
